contents.title: Language of Graphic Processes
contents.content:
Alternative way of thinking around processes, digital as language and Adobe's use of language as a constrained use of it. 

Adobe's use of graphic language to be a constrained use.

Creating a habitat for certain frames of ideas to exist.

contents.title: Translating Across Thresholds
contents.content: Crossing thresholds in order to translate from one materiality to another.
contents.content_html: Crossing thresholds in order to translate from one materiality to another.

contents.title: Material <-> Lanugage
contents.content:
Material 

---

Language

---


Language and material of virtual,
Language and material of physical.

The language we use for material changes how we interact with material. Materiality alters how we use language. 

Designing form out of language and material, multiple languages being able to talk to each other.
contents.content_html:
Material

Language

Language and material of virtual,
Language and material of physical.

The language we use for material changes how we interact with material. Materiality alters how we use language.

Designing form out of language and material, multiple languages being able to talk to each other.
